segments.text: I watch the scene in the kitchen calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands at the sink area, handling dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water level rises and spills over gently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She continues her task without interruption.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy uses a stool to reach the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He accesses the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, extending her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a garden path is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical domestic setting overall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nothing out of the ordinary catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from outside illuminates everything softly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's just an everyday moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
